verses.name: Judges 11:13
verses.text: And the king of the children of Ammon answered unto the messengers of Jephthah, Because Israel took away my land, when they came up out of Egypt, from Arnon even unto Jabbok, and unto Jordan: now therefore restore those lands again peaceably.

verses.name: Judges 11:14
verses.text: And Jephthah sent messengers again unto the king of the children of Ammon:

verses.name: Judges 11:15
verses.text: And said unto him, Thus saith Jephthah, Israel took not away the land of Moab, nor the land of the children of Ammon:

verses.name: Judges 11:16
verses.text: But when Israel came up from Egypt, and walked through the wilderness unto the Red sea, and came to Kadesh;
